str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
An egg. Apparently a primary word; an 'egg'.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) trans: I hand in, give up, (b) intrans: I give way (to the wind). From epi and didomi; to give over.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A scorpion. Probably from an obsolete skerpo; a 'scorpion'.
